alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:35AM CST until January 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek at Laurel. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 3.4 feet and slowly rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest near flood stage on Saturday. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 3.4 Wed 7 am CST 3.9 4.2 12.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this eveningthis evening at 845 PM CST.
